pages.text: Works very similar to its $(l:equipment/lesser_potion_pendant)little brother$(/l).$(br)In contrast this version has three chambers, each of which can be filled with a different potion. Since the individual chambers are smaller, it can only support effects up to Level I.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Use the $(l:brewing/potion_workshop)Potion Workshop$(/l) to fill it with potions.$(br)For each effect your $(l:general/pigment_palette)Pigment Palette$(/l) will use up specific color energy. The higher the level, the higher the cost.
